text:
@realDonaldTrump Dear Mr President
It is strange world is suffering from coronavirus and you all powerful heads of nations preparing WW3. Instead of improving medical infrastructure, you are focusing on weapons of mass destruction. Hight of irresponsibility! Common men suffers only. Alas!
